column2:
plot_ly(x = seq(from = 2, to = 6, by = 2), # 2, 4, 6
        y = seq(from = -3, to = 3, by = 3)) %>%  # -3, 0, 3
  layout(xaxis = list(rangemode = "tozero"),
         yaxis = list(rangemode = "nonnegative"))
